author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...HONE CHANGING LITTLE IN STRENGTH AS IT MOVES WEST-NORTHWESTWARD...
summary:
...HONE CHANGING LITTLE IN STRENGTH AS IT MOVES WEST-NORTHWESTWARD...
 As of 5:00 PM HST Tue Aug 27
 the center of Hone was located near 20.3, -167.0
 with movement WNW at 10 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 1002 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 50 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Hone (CP1/CP012024)
